FuncDef: This command configures the parameters that define if and how the local port will be affected when the local signal failure threshold (sf-threshold) has been reached within the configured window.

ParaDef.Info: Keyword that prevents the port from being affected when the configured signal failure threshold is reach within the window. The event will be logged but the port will remain operational.

Keyword that causes the port to enter a non-operation down state with a port state of link up. The error will be logged when the configured signal failure threshold (sf-threshold) is reached within the window. The port will not be available to service data but will continue to carry Link OAM traffic to ensure the link is monitored.
